body.name: CCCEI Desk Outlet Station 20W USB C Port. 12 Outlet Desktop Clamp Power Strip Surge Protector 4800J with Switch. Nightstand Office Standing Desk Accessories, Fit Thicker Table Edge or Screw Mount, 6FT
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 42 mins
features: Desk outlet stasion with 12 outlets and 4 USB-C and 4 USB-A ports, Come with 6 ft 14awg flat plug. Come with removeable clamp, to meet the needs of different customers who need to install it either on a table without or with edge.

12 outlets to accommodate more small electrical equipment, offer output: 125V/60HZ/15A/1875W. Each side USB max output: 20W. 18W Blue QC3.0 USB-A and 20W Blue PD 3.0 USB-C. Smart USB-A and USB-C offer 5V/2A. Can run up to 20 devices.

Extreme desktop space management, only need a small space between the table and the wall. Clamp and screw mounting options, the max desk edge width is up to 2.58inch, screw mounting if you need complete fixing.

Come with Off/On switch and ground and surge indicators, reserved a widely spaced outlet to plug desk electronic accessories large plugs. 4800J surge protector to absorb excess current to protect sensitive devices.
Made of ABS and fireproof material, please check whether each port is working properly before use. Say goodbye to annoying bending over to the floor looking for a spare close enough outlet.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Great addition to an office desk. DESK CLAMP OUTLET STATION 20 PORTS Desk accessories with multiple outlets and usb ports, the convenience of having a plug within reach when you need one! 20-in-1 desk mount power strip, supply power and tidy your desk.Removable; adapts to thicker tables; screw mountable.12 AC outlets and 2 of 5V/2.1A USB-A ports, 2 of 5V/2.1A USB-C ports, 2 of PD3.0 USB-C, 2 of QC3.0 USB-A charging ports.Flat plug and widely spaced outlet.

Brand Overview Welcome to CCCEI Brand, we provide offer a variety of professional and creative office and industrial power strip equipment, more item is built for business and furniture use, we can also provide bulk services. We are very happy to serve our customers and offer more favorable discount for more cooperation. CCCEI brand desk outlet station, provide professional desk power solutions for desk electronic accessories- Three-sided 12-outlets clamp power strip with switch and ground and surge indicators, flat plug power cord.8 USB ports will power more small USB devices, we also offer a strong power 45w output version that can power two laptops at the same time, available for purchase if needed.Available in two different power versions: Max output 18W QC 3.0 USB-A and 20W USB-C, 36W QC 3.0 USB-A and 45W USB-C. Fast charging for your phone or other small devices. Save money on extra USB-C plugs. Note: Max output when used alone.Help Keep the Desk Organized: Say goodbye to annoying bending over to the floor looking for outlets, The clips are removable and designed to get a larger opening or can be mounted on a tabletop with no edges.Surge Protection: Provides multiple protections-over-load, short-circuit, over-circuit, over-heated protection, 4800J surge protector to cope with spike voltages.

Product Specification AC Output 125V/15A/1875W PPS 3.3V-16V/3.25A; 3.3V-21V/3A 20W Blue PD3.0 USB-C Ports 20W Variant-Max 5V/3A, 9V/2.22A, 12V/1.66A 18W Blue QC3.0 USB-A Ports 18W Variant-Max 5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A. 45W Blue PD3.0 USB-C Ports 45W Variant-Max 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 15V/2.5A, 20V/2.25A 36W Blue QC3.0 USB-A Ports 36W Variant-Max 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 12V/3A Use two or more USB on a side Share Total Power Power Cord 14AWG-6FT/10FT Two Variants-Flat Plug Switch ON/OFF Indicator Light USB Indicator Light, Grounded Indicator, Surge Indicator Surge Protector 4800J

Standing Desk Accessories Useful for stand-up desk, when the desk was raised, no need to worry that devices have power cords that are too short in length to continue working! Desk Power Outlet Attachment Keep the power cord away from the ground to prevent children or pets from touching the power supply and causing potential hazards. Removable Clamp Edge Mount Clamps with different openings are obtained by moving the clamps. Thus it can be used on the edge of a desktop up to 2.58inch thick. No Edge Screw Mount Remove the pole and mount the socket by screws on the furniture without edges. and is suitable for nightstand. (Additional mount screws not included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute necessity in a tiny office!
reviews.reviewText: We have a tiny cabin and my 'office' is a dedicated work space that's about the size of your average closet! Space is always at a premium and with every new gadget or piece of equipment I have there's one more thing that I need to try and find a place to plug in and then I have to try and keep the wires corralled. I had never even thought 'out of the box' beyond a very large, clunky power strip!This thing is amazing. It takes up no room on the wall or floor, doesn't clutter up my already minuscule desk, and keeps everything in order. It has a dozen regular outlet plugs and 4 USB and 4 USB-C ports so you can cut back on how many charger bricks you're using! It's also a surge protector, so it offers another layer of protection to my electronics. I really like the fact that it clamps to my desk (no drilling or tacky adhesive!) which both secures it and allowed me to position it out of my way so I'm knocking into cords or getting them tangled underfoot. I can see how this power station could come in handy in several places around the house, like your entertainment area (TV, gaming consoles, sound bars, etc) or on the workbench where you might want to have several smaller things (chargers, radio, small tools) always at the ready without taking up all of your wall outlets!The unit itself seems well built and sturdy, and it looks nice. A weird thing to say, maybe, but it looks 'professional' if you will. It's not clunky, and it doesn't have any weird decorative flair. It's utilitarian without being ugly, so you won't mind if it's not hidden out of sight (unlike a lot of power strips I've used, which are often rather unattractive and hidden behind or under my desk, making plugging something in a nuisance).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Design Leaves Room for Improvement
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the CCCEI Desk Outlet Station for use on my garage work bench. Anyone with a work bench typically experiences the case where they have more devices than outlets and in recent years, the continual need to find USB chargers for various lights, modern soldering irons, etc. This outlet station caught my eye due to the large number of outlets, both USB and standard, as well as the clamp mechanism for attachment to a desk.My first impression out of the box was that the build quality could have been a bit better. The body itself is plastic that has a very slight flex to it and the main clamp is a bit weak for the main attachment point. When attached to the desk with the clamp, even screwing it down as hard as I physically could, there is still some slight flex and wobble. Moving forward, I am likely to remove the clamp assembly and directly screw the unit to my desk for a more secure hold. Something like an aluminum frame would have gone a long way in the constructions.My next gripe is that the plug exists the unit from the side rather than the rear. This causes it to push down against a desk if your outlet is underneath also causing a bit of shift or tilt. Had the cord exited the back, the unit would have sit more flush against the desk.I like that there are outlets on the back, top, and front. The outlets in the back are prefect for those devices one doesn't often unplug and the ones to the front and top are perfect for plugs on the fly. The inclusion of 45w USB C plugs are great for modern soldering irons that can be powered off USB-C as well as USB-A outlets for LED desk lights, phones, etc.Overall, the number of outlets, choices of USB, surge protection, etc. are a perfect combination for a workbench environment. Had the body been constructed of more durable materials such as aluminum and the power cord moved to the rear of the unit instead of the side, it would have been perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, robust, easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great outlet and I can't believe I have been crawling under my desk all these years when this is available.First, this is a simple power outlet with lots of plugs... twelve 110v outlets to be exact. It also has four usb-a outlets and 4 usb-c outlets.It is made from lightweight plastic, not overly heavy duty but robust none the less. The clamp itself is metal though and holds well on the desk.The power cord is nice and long so reaching the wall outlet is easy.This is one of the best items I have ordered and keeps me from having to crawl under my desk. Having plenty of 110v outlets and usb-a and usb-c right on my desktop has simplified my life.This is an amazing buy and a great gift for someone with lots of things to plug in on their desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has got to be one of my favorite items. I am a writer so electronics are a must. I always used a power strip but somehow they are always in the way. This is the perfect solution. It clamps easy to my wood desk and it is not in the way at all. This item has twelve plug in outlets and 4 USB A ports and 4 USB C ports. This also has over current protection, short circuit protection, over voltage protection, and surge protection so it is meant to handle the needs of the modern world electronics. This is a must have item for desks and workstations. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Desk outlet station that brings surge protection up to desk level
reviews.reviewText: I love that the fastener can be adjusted to fit a thicker or thinner desk without a ton of fastener turns. I am also at that age where my knees won't let me hit the deck as easily as I used to, so bringing everything up to desk level is better. This feels very solidly made, so I am not worried out anything sparking or overheating as long as there is ample airflow. Right now, it's long cord is plugged into my UPS so that's really the only reason I'd have to drop under my desk. Everything is easy to reach, including USB charging.
